current_task: Fixed circular dependency in validation system
handoff_message: âœ… COMPLETE: Eliminated circular dependency in validation system (CRITICAL BUG FIX). ROOT CAUSE: agent_state.json tracked last_commit, but updating it created new commit, causing perpetual one-commit lag (mathematically impossible to solve). SOLUTION: Removed last_commit field entirely, validate git state directly via git rev-parse HEAD. GEMINI VALIDATION: Design approved 100/100 before implementation (new tool: gemini_design_review.py). IMPLEMENTATION: (1) Removed last_commit from agent_state.json schema, (2) Updated handoff_validation_tests.py to check git directly, (3) Updated pre-commit hook to remove last_commit from required fields, (4) Updated gate_4_gemini_eval.py to validate required fields instead of comparing commits. TEST RESULTS: Pre-handoff validation 6/6 passed, Gate 4 APPROVE (90/100), no more circular dependency. PATTERN: Git is source of truth - state files track session metadata (timestamps, agents, tasks), NOT commit hashes. Documentation: CIRCULAR_DEPENDENCY_DIAGNOSIS.md (complete root cause analysis with evidence, proposed solutions, implementation summary). Next session will NOT see state out of sync error.
